effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.x-y: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Has a 20% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.x-y: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
